body_html:
@csachs I have tried this but bazel still complains about the build being corrupted. How exactly did you change mtime?

As a workaround, I changed exit 1 to exec 2to3 $@ [and changed the mtime of the file (soft-link target!) to the future, as bazel apparently checks if the build tools have been tampered with), and could successfully build TF.

body:
@csachs I have tried this but bazel still complains about the build being corrupted. How exactly did you change mtime?

> As a workaround, I changed exit 1 to exec 2to3 $@ [and changed the mtime of the file (soft-link target!) to the future, as bazel apparently checks if the build tools have been tampered with), and could successfully build TF.
